mapper.select: SELECT CATEGORY, CLASSNO, TITLE, INSNAME, INSID, RSVTIME FROM MEMBERCLASSSCHEDULEVIEW WHERE MEMNO = #{memNo} AND RSVDATE = TO_DATE(#{date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY RSVTIME

SELECT IP.MEM_NAME AS INSNAME, IP.MEM_ID AS INSID , ME.MISSION_DATE AS MISSIONDATE, E.EXE_NAME AS EXENAME , EE.EXE_EQ_NAME AS EXEEQNAME, D.DIF_NAME AS DIFNAME, EP.EXE_PART AS EXEPART , ME.MIS_SET AS MISSET, ME.MIS_COUNT AS MISCOUNT, ME.MIS_WEIGHT AS MISWEIGHT , ME.MISSION_EXE_NO AS MISSIONEXENO, ME.MISSION_COM_CK AS MISSIONCOMCK FROM MISSION_EXERCISE ME LEFT JOIN MISSION M ON M.MISSION_NO = ME.MISSION_NO LEFT JOIN EXERCISE E ON ME.EXERCISE_NO = E.EXERCISE_NO LEFT JOIN EXERCISE_EQUIPMENT EE ON E.EXE_EQ_NO = EE.EXE_EQ_NO LEFT JOIN DIFFICULTY D ON E.DIF_NO = D.DIF_NO LEFT JOIN EXERCISE_PART EP ON E.EXE_PART_NO = EP.EXE_PART_NO LEFT JOIN CLASS_COMPLETE CC ON M.CLASS_COM_NO = CC.CLASS_COM_NO LEFT JOIN CLASS_RESERVATION CR ON CC.CLASS_RSV_NO = CR.CLASS_RSV_NO LEFT JOIN CLASS C ON CR.CLASS_NO = C.CLASS_NO LEFT JOIN PRIVACY IP ON FN_MEM_NO(C.INS_NO) = IP.MEM_NO WHERE CR.MEM_NO = #{memNo} AND ME.MISSION_DATE = TO_DATE(#{date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')

SELECT EL.EXE_LOG_NO AS EXELOGNO, EL.EXE_LOG_DATE AS EXELOGDATE , EL.EXE_SET AS EXESET, EL.EXE_COUNT AS EXECOUNT, EL.WEIGHT AS WEIGHT , E.EXE_NAME AS EXENAME, EE.EXE_EQ_NAME AS EXEEQNAME, D.DIF_NAME AS DIFNAME, EP.EXE_PART AS EXEPART FROM EXERCISE_LOG EL LEFT JOIN EXERCISE E ON EL.EXERCISE_NO = E.EXERCISE_NO LEFT JOIN EXERCISE_EQUIPMENT EE ON E.EXE_EQ_NO = EE.EXE_EQ_NO LEFT JOIN DIFFICULTY D ON E.DIF_NO = D.DIF_NO LEFT JOIN EXERCISE_PART EP ON E.EXE_PART_NO = EP.EXE_PART_NO WHERE EL.MEM_NO = #{memNo} AND EL.EXE_LOG_DATE = TO_DATE(#{date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
